The programme is being supported by grant money from Auckland Airport. Photo / Greg Bowker

Disposable vapes banned: Retailers encourage stockpiling ahead of crackdown https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/vape-retailers-encourage-stockpiling-ahead-of-crackdown-on-cheap-disposable-and-high-strength-products/ZC2NRREOEVHTLIUL74RC5IYKN4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/vape-retailers-encourage-stockpiling-ahead-of-crackdown-on-cheap-disposable-and-high-strength-products/ZC2NRREOEVHTLIUL74RC5IYKN4/ Isaac DavisonBy next week, disposable vapes need to have maximum nicotine limits and safety features Sun, 10 Dec 2023 16:00:00 +0000 The number of young people taking up vaping is growing each year.
